Yes, my home is full of love and laughter.
i hope to become a music teacher after retirement.
i hate cooking.
I will use my black purse to store my stock market reports.
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.

participant_2.background:
I like to visit food blogs for inspiration on my next hearty stew.
I collect books to keep my reading ability sharp.
I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
I am not close to my family but I want to be.
I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.

content.text: I used to work for Monsanto, but I left to pursue my passion for music.
That's awesome! I wish I had the courage to do that!
I think you've got the courage, you just need to find the right passion.
Maybe so. I'll just have to keep looking.
I'm sure you will find it!
No problem. So, what do you like to do in your free time?
I love to cook, especially hearty stews. I get a lot of inspiration from food blogs.
That's awesome! I wish I could cook like that.
It's not that hard, you just need to find recipes that you like and practice a bit.
You should! It's a lot of fun, and you can make some really delicious food.
I'm sure I will. Thanks for the advice!
